languages.text: "Зачем? Для миссионера храм — клочок палубы под его ногами. Отсюда мне отлично видна жизнь моей паствы, ее суета, расцвет и увядание. Здесь я вижу все их греховные порывы, тщетные надежды и крупицы искренности".

traits.locale_text: "Зачем? Для миссионера храм — клочок палубы под его ногами. Отсюда мне отлично видна жизнь моей паствы, ее суета, расцвет и увядание. Здесь я вижу все их греховные порывы, тщетные надежды и крупицы искренности".

languages.text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."
languages.original_text: "Зачем? Для миссионера храм — клочок палубы под его ногами. Отсюда мне отлично видна жизнь моей паствы, ее суета, расцвет и увядание. Здесь я вижу все их греховные порывы, тщетные надежды и крупицы искренности".

traits.locale_text: "Why? For a missionary, the patch of the deck under his feet is his temple. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock in all of its bustle, bloom, and wilting. Here I can see their sinful urges, futile hopes, and grains of sincerity."

"Why? For a missionary, the patch of the deck under his feet is his temple. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock in all of its bustle, bloom, and wilting. Here I can see their sinful urges, futile hopes, and grains of sincerity."

"Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their sinful urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

"Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their sinful urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

"Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

languages.text: “这是何故？对传教士而言，他的神殿就是他脚下的甲板。从我站着的地方，我可以清楚地看到我的牧群如何生活，我可以看到它的喧嚣、绽放与枯萎。在这里，我可以看到他们罪恶的冲动、徒劳的希望，以及真诚的光亮。”
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: “这是何故？对传教士而言，他的神殿就是他脚下的甲板。从我站着的地方，我可以清楚地看到我的牧群如何生活，我可以看到它的喧嚣、绽放与枯萎。在这里，我可以看到他们罪恶的冲动、徒劳的希望，以及真诚的光芒。”

languages.text: «¿Para qué? Para un misionero, su templo es el suelo bajo sus pies. Desde mi posición, puedo cómo vive mi rebaño, cómo florece y cómo se marchita. Desde aquí soy testigo de sus deseos inmundos, sus esperanzas fútiles y sus atisbos de sinceridad».
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: «¿Para qué? Para un misionero, su templo es el suelo bajo sus pies. Desde mi posición, puedo cómo vive mi rebaño, cómo florece y cómo se marchita. Desde aquí soy testigo de sus deseos pecaminosos, sus esperanzas fútiles y sus atisbos de sinceridad».

languages.text: 「なぜですか？伝道師にとって、所属する寺院は揺るぎない基盤のようなもの。この場所に立てば、迷える子羊たちの生活が賑やかに咲き誇ったり、萎んでいく姿をはっきりと見ることができます。彼らの下劣な衝動も、無益な希望も、一瞬の誠意も見逃しません」
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜですか？伝道師にとって、所属する寺院は揺るぎない基盤のようなもの。この場所に立てば、迷える子羊たちの生活が賑やかに咲き誇ったり、萎んでいく姿をはっきりと見ることができます。彼らの罪深い衝動も、無益な希望も、一瞬の誠意も見逃しません」

languages.text: "Wozu? Für einen Missionar ist sein Tempel das Deck unter seinen Füßen. Von meinem Standpunkt aus überblicke ich das Leben meiner Herde, wie sie lebt, blüht und vergeht. Ich sehe sündige Wünsche, vergebliche Hoffnungen und Anflüge von Ehrlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: "Wozu? Für einen Missionar ist sein Tempel das Deck unter seinen Füßen. Von meinem Standpunkt aus überblicke ich das Leben meiner Herde, wie sie lebt, blüht und vergeht. Ich sehe sündige Wünsche, vergebliche Hoffnungen und Anflüge von Ehrlichkeit."

languages.text: « Pour quelle raison ? Le temple d'un missionnaire est le sol sur lequel il se tient. D'ici, je discerne clairement la vie de mes ouailles dans toute son agitation, sa prospérité et son flétrissement. D'ici, je vois leurs vils désirs, leurs espoirs futiles et leurs éclairs de sincérité. »
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Le temple d'un missionnaire est le sol sur lequel il se tient. D'ici, je discerne clairement la vie de mes ouailles dans toute son agitation, sa prospérité et son flétrissement. D'ici, je vois leurs désirs impurs, leurs espoirs futiles et leurs éclairs de sincérité. »

languages.text: "Neden? Bir misyonerin tapınağı, ayağının altındaki güverte zeminidir. Durduğum yerden cemaatimin yeşeren, serpilen ve solan yaşamlarını net bir şekilde izleyebiliyorum. Buradan onların kötücül dürtülerini, boş umutlarını ve nadiren de olsa samimiyetlerini görebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "Why? For a missionary, his temple is the patch of deck beneath his feet. From where I stand, I can clearly see the life of my flock, all its bustling, blooming, and wilting. Here I can see their vile urges, futile hopes, and flashes of sincerity."

traits.locale_text: "Neden? Bir misyonerin tapınağı, ayağının altındaki zemindir. Durduğum yerden cemaatimin yeşeren, serpilen ve solan yaşamlarını net bir şekilde izleyebiliyorum. Buradan onların kötücül dürtülerini, boş umutlarını ve nadiren de olsa samimiyetlerini görebiliyorum."
